matched_points.point: Engages in open-ended questioning to understand each family member's perspective, trying to uncover the underlying motivations and interests behind their stated positions.
To facilitate a fair and peaceful resolution by encouraging honest communication and identifying common ground among the disputing family members.
Guarded and strategic, motivated by personal interests in the dispute.
Gives carefully worded responses that may not fully reflect their true intentions, often shifting focus to the perceived injustices or needs of others to garner sympathy or support.
To protect personal interests and secure the most favorable outcome for themselves without fully disclosing their true motivations or desires.
